title: urgent type ID
content:
Okay im not really searching for an exact ID but Can sum one point me in a direction edging towards this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419083308im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KCNHO123_4910.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [KCNHO123.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419083308/http:/typophile.com/files/KCNHO123.jpg) | 116.17 KB |
author: KCNHO

comments.content:
Hi Constant,

the high ‘A’ bar and the ‘S’ suggest that this could be based on [University Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419083308/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=university&site=d&sample_text=CASINO).  
F
